resources.string: Find words from the given word\'s anagrams
Find words that start with given letters
Find words contained in a given sequence of letters
Find words from a combination of letters
Insert a word or a set of letters to find all its anagrams.\nThe max number of letters depends on the longest word present in the dictionary.
Find all the words that start with the given set of letters.\nThe max number of letters depends on the longest word present in the dictionary.
Given a sequence of letters, finds all the existing words from left to right, like in a word search puzzle game.\nThe max number of letters depends on the longest word present in the dictionary.
Given a combination of letters, finds all the possible existing anagrams with same or lesser length.\nDue to computational reasons, the max number of letters is set to 15.

The wildcard \"?\" is a character that can be replaced by any letter. Use the wildcard to find all the words that match the positions of the given letters.\nThe max number of letters depends on the longest word present in the dictionary and the max number of wildcards is 15 due to computational reasons. There must be at least one letter inserted.
Given the word \"CAT\" you get the anagram ACT
Given the letters \"FLO\" you get the words like FLOP, FLOW, FLOOD, FLOOR and so on…
Given the letters \"VERTICALL\" you get the words like VERTICAL, CALL and ALL
Given the letters \"AERD\" you get the words like DARE, DEAR, READ, RAD, RED, EAR, ERA and so on…
Given the letters \"S??CE\" you get the words like SLICE, SPACE, SINCE and so on…
